meaningMnemonic: Do you remember how 米国 can mean "America?" That 米 means America sometimes. So, when you see <kanji>all</kanji> <kanji>rice</kanji> (I mean, <kanji>America</kanji>), you can think of this word as meaning <vocabulary>All America</vocabulary> (sort of like how 全日本 means "All Japan.").
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
